name: typescript-to-javascript
title: TypeScript to JavaScript
description: Strips TypeScript code of types to be easily pluggable to a JavaScript REPL etc.
author: bengry

commands.name: paste-from-clipboard
commands.title: Paste as JavaScript
commands.description: Paste the TypeScript code in the clipboard as plain JavaScript

commands.name: copy-to-clipboard
commands.title: Copy as JavaScript
commands.description: Copy the TypeScript code in the clipboard as plain JavaScript
